name: The Capybaras of Ipaussu [ Descolada // Yellow bb, 03L ]
description: IWC (WaveL Bitmap Format) Databending Glitch, 2021. Source photograph taken in Ipaussu, SP, Brazil in 2019. *The Capybaras of Ipaussu* is a chronicle of the anthropocene told with glitched photographs in obscure media formats. // Work by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG
